title: all of me

description.plain:
In “​all of me,” backed by a soulful Rose Royce sample, 21 Savage puts forth his signature laid-back flow, addressing events that shaped him as a person.

Savage delves into his childhood, marked by crime and tragedy. At the age of 6, he emigrated from England into the harsh streets of Atlanta, Georgia.

This track released via the trailer for Savage’s so-called debut film, american dream: the 21 savage story, which was a ploy to promote american dream.

embed_content: Read “all of me” by 21 Savage on Genius

See, my shooter pescatarian, but he eat up all the beef (21)
You gave me your ass to kiss, but want the all of me (Goddamn)

All I got is these lil' pictures when I think 'bout all the G's (21)

I know Satan down that path, but God walkin' with me
Put your phone light in the air if you done lost a nigga (21)
